content: Boris, I’m going through the same tribulations now trying to find the best personal CRM to manage my personal network. I recently departed with Contactually, but I might go back. Have you tried Nimble? I think I’ll have to decide between Nimble, Contactually and Highrise. Tagging is an important feature for me, which most have, but I want something that will remind me to contact stale contacts that I’m forgetting. Keen to get your thoughts.
